testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User should be enter the URL navigates to the LUMA webpage
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in homepage of LUMA....................................passed Then User should be click on the Create An Account button...................passed And It Navigates to Create New Customer Account webpage.....................passed

testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User Should be Enter The Firstname,Lastname,Email,Password,Confirm Password With Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in the Account Creation Page...........................passed When User should be enter the Firstname,Lastname,Email,Password and Confirm Password.passed And USer should be click the Create An Account button.......................passed Then It Navigates to My Account webpage.....................................passed

testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User Should be Click The Mens-Top-Jackets and select the Product
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in the My Account Page.................................passed When User should be click the Men and Moves to Top and then click the Jackets.passed And User should be select the product and click.............................passed Then It Navigates to Product page...........................................passed

testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User Should be Select the Size, Colour and Quantity
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in the Product Page....................................passed When User should be select the "L" Size of the Product......................passed When User should be select the Colour of the Product........................passed And User should be select the Quantity of the Product.......................passed And User should be click the Add to Cart button and click the Shopping Cart Link.passed Then It Navigates to Shopping Cart Page.....................................passed

testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User Should be Click the Proceed To Check
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in the Shopping Cart Page..............................passed And User should be clik the Proceed to Checkout button......................passed Then It Navigates to Shopping Address Checkout Page.........................passed

testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User Should be Enter the Address Details in the Field
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in the CheckoutPage....................................passed Given User should be enter the Street,Street1,Street2,City,State,Zip and Phone number in the Field.passed Given User should be click the Shipping Methods.............................passed And User should be click the Next button....................................passed Then It Navigates to Review our Payments and Checkout Page..................passed

testcase.classname: To Verify The Luma E-Commerce Shopping Application
testcase.name: User Should be verify And Place The Order
testcase.system-out: Given User should be in Order Place Page....................................passed When User should be verify the Payment method...............................passed And User should be click the Place order button.............................passed Then It Navigates to the Successful Page....................................passed
